thread.title: Visit Bhutan 2015 at Thai International Travel Fair
thread.title_full: Visit Bhutan 2015 at Thai International Travel Fair

author: eTN Editor
title: Visit Bhutan 2015 at Thai International Travel Fair
text:
Visit Bhutan 2015 at Thai International Travel Fair   
By Andrew J. Wood, special to eTN | Aug 14, 2015 H.E. Mr. Kesang Wangdi / All photos Â© A. J. Wood Banners   
BANGKOK, Thailand (eTN) - Last night at a lavish cocktail party held on the sidelines of the Thai International Travel Fair (TIFT), which is being held at the Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre in Bangkok, Thailand, the Royal Bhutanese Embassy in Thailand presented Visit Bhutan Year 2015 to over 200 invited guests. 
H.E. Mr. Kesang Wangdi, Ambassador of Bhutan to Thailand, welcomed all guests including guests of honor Assoc. Prof. Dr. Chavanee Tongroach, Vice Minister for Tourism and Sports; Mr. Suparerk Soorangura (NS Travel & Tours), President of the Thai Travel Agents Association and organizers of TITF; and Mr. Anake Srishevachart, President of Unithai Co Ltd. (Thaisinn Express) and Chief Advisor to TTAA. 
Bhutan's Visit Year 2015 was launched last year in December to coincide with the auspicious celebrations on the 60th anniversary of His Majesty the Fourth Druk Gyalpo Jigme Singye Wangchuck. 
The Tourism Council of Bhutan, Druk Air, and Bhutan Airlines have joined forces with the government to further promote tourism to Bhutan with a series of special packages, promotions, and festivals throughout 2015.
